nodes.text: The Zim Systems ROCKET was a personal rocket pack produced during the Old Republic era. It cost 750 credits to purchase and had ten charges. Each charge could be used to propel up to 80 kilograms of weight 40 meters vertically, or 120 meters horizontally. ROCKETs were used by the elite commandos of the Galactic Republic's Rocket-Jumper Elite Advance Unit.
